metadata.title: CVE-2018-7409 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - low
metadata.description:
In unixODBC before 2.3.5, there is a buffer overflow in theunicode_to_ansi_copy() function in DriverManager/__info.c.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-7409` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libodbc1 - 2.3.1-4.1ubuntu0.1~esm1
odbcinst - 2.3.1-4.1ubuntu0.1~esm1
odbcinst1debian2 - 2.3.1-4.1ubuntu0.1~esm1
unixodbc - 2.3.1-4.1ubuntu0.1~esm1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: unixodbc package in esm-infra/xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.3.1-4.1ubuntu0.1~esm1').
